attributes.action: End Discrimination and Violence through Early Years Education!
attributes.additional_details: Right now, 1 in 6 young citizens across the UK are experiencing record levels of anxiety & depression in a mental health pandemic. Furthermore, gender-based violence & systemic racism continue to lead to national outrage, all in the midst of an intensifying climate emergency. Think Equal is a cost-efficient, plug & play, evidence-based solution constructed by global thought leaders to change mindset while brains are still developing. Changing the world is not rocket science - it's neuroscience!
attributes.background: We ask the government urgently to stop reacting & start preventing the societal crises plaguing our streets. Think Equal is a preventative, evidence-based, holistic social justice programme that has been designed by global experts to tackle the root causes of violence, discrimination & inequality.

rejection.details: It isn't clear how you would like the Government to implement a programme in early years education to prevent discrimination and violence. You might start a petition setting out clear actions for the Government to do this.
